column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE edua dze fua akata Zion babaa do wɔ n'ebufuw mu a! Ofi sor atow Israel n'ahoɔfɛw akyen asaase do
column3: Na ɔnnkaa n'ananadzegua wɔ n'ebufuw da no mu."

column2: "EWURADZE asɛɛ Jakob ne ntsenabea nyina
column3: na oennhu no mbɔbɔr; N'ebufuhyew mu no oedwuruw Juda babaa n'aban dzendzen egu famu; na oegu ahendzi no na mu mbapɔmba no ho fi."

column2: "Oetwa Israel ahoɔdzen nyina egu wɔ n'ebufuhyew mu; Ɔatwe ne nsa nyimfa ekyir efi hɔnho wɔ ɔtamfo no enyim: Na ɔahyew Jakob dɛ gyaframee a ɔhyew bɔ aprɔw."
"Ɔakontom n'egyen dɛ ɔtamfo
column3: ɔdze ne nsa nyimfa egyina dɛ ahohiahianyi
column4: Na oekuku hɔn a yɛdze hɔn hoahoaa hɛnho nyina: Oehue n'ebufuhyew egu dɛ ogya

column2: "EWURADZE adan dɛ ɔtamfo
column3: ɔamen Israel; Ɔamemen n'ahemfi nyinara
column4: ɔasɛɛ n'akoban so: Na ɔama babaa Juda no nkɔmbɔdzi na sukwadwom adɔɔ so."

column2: "Oebubu ne ntamadan mu
column3: dɛ gyama ture bi; Ɔasɛɛ n'eguabɔbea: EWURADZE etwa nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn na ahomgyeda mu wɔ Zion. Na n'ebufuw ne hyeehyew no mu oebu ɔhen no na ɔsɔfo no enyimtsia."

column2: "EWURADZE atow n'afɔrmbukyia akyen
column3: na no krɔnkrɔnbea ho ayɛ no mfon
column4: Ɔdze n'ahemfie afasu no ahyɛ ɔtamfo no nsa; Wɔyɛɛ dede wɔ EWURADZE fie

column2: "EWURADZE esua ne tsir mu dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ Zion babaa n'afasu; Ɔatwe ahoma no mu
column3: ɔnntwee ne nsa ekyir nngyaa dɛ ɔresɛɛ adze: Na ɔama pampi na fasu etwa sukwadwom; wɔabɔ mu afomfɔn."

column2: "No mbobokɛse no amem famu; ɔasɛɛ n'adaban no na oebubu mu. Ne hen na ne mbapɔmba wɔ amanaman mu mbra nnyi hɔ bio; Nyew
column3: no nkɔnhyɛfo nnya EWURADZE hɔ enyido adzehu."

column2: "Zion babaa ne mpanyimfo tsetse famu
column3: wɔayeyɛ konkomm; Woetu huntuma egugu hɔn etsifi
column4: wɔdze eyitam esisi hɔn asen: Jerusalɛm mbaabun esisi hɔn etsir adze."

column2: "Nyinsuwa ama m'enyiwa resa
column3: mo nson mu hyehye me
column5: wɔ me man ne babaa ne sɛɛe ntsi; Osiandɛ mbofra nkakraba na enumfoanomba atotɔ bitsi wɔ kurow n'abrɔn no mu."

column2: "Wobisa hɔn nanom dɛ
column3: Henfa na eburow na wenyin wɔ? Ber a wɔatotɔ bitsi dɛ epirafo wɔ kurow n'abrɔn no mu
column4: Ber a woehue hɔn kra egu hɔn nanom hɔn bo mu."

column2: "Ebɛn dase na mindzi nkyerɛ wo? Jerusalɛm babaa
column3: ebɛnadze na memfa ntoto wo ho? Zion babaa baabun
column4: ebɛnadze na memma ɔnye wo nsɛ
column5: mfa nkyekye wo werɛ? Na wo pira so dɛ po: woana botum ayɛ wo edur?"

column2: "Wo nkɔnhyɛfo ehu egyangyandze na nkwaseasɛm ho enyido adzehu ama wo; Na wɔannda w'emumuyɛ edzi
column3: dɛ wɔdze wo ndɔmmumkɔ bɛsan aba; Na mbom ator na nkɔnhyɛsɛm a ɔma efom na wohunii kyerɛɛ wo."

column2: "Hɔn a wotwa mu sen nyina bɔ hɔn nsamu gu wo do; Wɔsesar Jerusalɛm babaa na wɔwosow hɔn tsir gu no do
column3: dɛ: Aso iyi nye kurow a adasamba frɛ no Ahoɔfɛw a oedzi mu

column2: "W'atamfo nyina ahanhan hɔn anomu wɔ wo do; Wɔsesar na wɔtwɛr hɔn se; wɔka dɛ
column3: Yɛamemen no! Nyew
column4: da a yɛhwɛɛ no kwan no nye yi; yeenya

column2: "EWURADZE ayɛ dza osusui no; Ɔama n'asɛm aba mu pɛpɛɛpɛr dza ɔhyɛe wɔ tsetse nda mu no; Oedwuruw egu famu
column3: oennya ehumbɔbɔr: Na ɔama ɔtamfo edzi wo eduwa; Ɔama w'ahohiahiafo ahoɔdzen do."

column2: "Hɔn akoma kekaa mu frɛɛ EWURADZE: Ao Zion babaa ne fasu! Ma nyinsuwa mpem dɛ esutsen adzekyee na anadwe; Mma nngye w'ahom
column3: mma mma w'enyiwa nnda."

column2: "Soɛr
column3: keka mu wɔ anadwe
column4: wɔ adasu n'ahyɛse; Hue w'akoma dɛ nsu gu wɔ EWURADZE n'enyim: Ma wo nsa do kyerɛ no do wɔ wo mbofra nkakraba no hɔn nkwa ntsi
column5: Ɔkɔm ntsi wɔtotɔ bitsi wɔ abrɔn biara etsifi."

column2: "EWURADZE e
column3: hwɛ
column4: na hu nyia ayɛ no dɛm yi! Aso mbaa bedzi hɔn yafumba
column5: mboframba a hɔnara wɔawo hɔn no? Aso woboku ɔsɔfo na nkɔnhyɛnyi wɔ EWURADZE no krɔnkrɔnbea?"

column2: "Aberantsɛ na akɔdaa wɔdeda famu wɔ abrɔn mu; Me nkataasia na me mberantsɛ atotɔ afona anomu: Ekuku hɔn w'ebufuw da no mu; eku
column3: na ennhu mbɔbɔr."

column2: "Ɔwo afrɛ m'atamfo wɔ mbea nyina dɛ gyama afahyɛ da bi
column3: Na obiara nnyi hɔ a ofii nsa anaa ɔkae wɔ EWURADZE n'ebufuw da no mu: Hɔn a magyegye hɔn na manyɛn hɔn no
